description:
The seismic response processing module is a Java based library that provides support for removing
instrument response signals from seismic recordings. The response module provides support for
EvalResp, PZF, PAZ, FAP, PAZFIR, PAZFAP, FIRFAP, and CSS response types and parallel processing
support for transfer operations. Additionally, the response module uses the JSR-363 units of
measurement specification to allow for transfer to and from a wide range of units types to represent the
time-series.
name: Seismic Response Processing Module
